snippet: A federal grand jury indicted Russell Wasendorf Sr., the chief executive of the collapsed brokerage firm Peregrine Financial Group, a month after he confessed to stealing from clients and defrauding banks.
abstract: A federal grand jury indicted Russell Wasendorf Sr., the chief executive of the collapsed brokerage firm Peregrine Financial Group, a month after he confessed to stealing from clients and defrauding banks.

headline.main: Peregrine Chief Is Indicted in Brokerage Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Peregrine Chief Is Indicted In Brokerage Fraud Case
